front.title: Idle Mode Handover Support in IPv6 Networks

abstract.t: This document considers the problem of expediting authenticated networkaccess as well as enabling authorized context transfer during idle-modehandovers. In essence, this document addresses idle-mode contexttransfers, so that an idle-mode Mobile Node (MN) can resume its sessionsin a seamless fashion. We propose supplying the session key in thepaging message to the Access Router (AR) that locates the idle MobileNode.
